# k-progress-bar

`k-progress-bar` is Vuh's web component for a progress bar.

It receives no children, as its content is determined by props.

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| `value`  | `value`   |             | `number` | `0`     |
